sn46.77-88:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ganga nadi pacinaninna pacinapona pacinapabbhara;
sn46.77-88:1.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satta bojjhange bhavento satta bojjhange bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo.
sn46.77-88:1.3: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satta bojjhange bhavento satta bojjhange bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo?
sn46.77-88:1.5: upekkhasambojjhangam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim …
sn46.77-88:1.6: evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satta bojjhange bhavento satta bojjhange bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo”ti.
